thread.title: adidas Originals x Alexander Wang Return With a Second Drop of Sportswear Heat
thread.title_full: adidas Originals x Alexander Wang Return With a Second Drop of Sportswear Heat

author: Graeme Campbell
title: adidas Originals x Alexander Wang Return With a Second Drop of Sportswear Heat
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
adidas Originals and high-fashion titan Alexander Wang’s partnership continues with a second, 14-piece drop loaded with sportswear bangers and two new sneakers.
Wang hinted at how the spring collection would look in an interview last month, and true to form, the iconic trefoil logo has been inverted across a selection of unisex apparel including tracksuits, shorts and crop tops. As can be seen below and in the above NYC-shot lookbook by Juergen Teller, colorways are available in black, blue and burgundy.
Additionally, two previously speculated sneakers have been unveiled. The “Run” and “Run Clean” come equipped with Boost tooling, stretch mesh, Primeknit and an elastic lacing system for ultimate comfort and performance.
Releasing on March 4, the latest range will be stocked at seven global retailers including Barneys (New York), colette (Paris), Antonioli (Milan), Storm (Copenhagen), Dover Street Market (Ginza), Boon the Shop (Seoul), and Joyce (Hong Kong). Also look for it dropping on the adidas Originals and Alexander Wang websites.
In other adidas Originals news, Kim Kardashian is lavishing fans with free “Zebra” YEEZY 350 V2 Boost’s on Twitter.
